steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6bgf4","text":"Collect the brain sections at 240-micron intervals across the neuroaxis, place them into a net well (Brain research laboratories) and wash 3 times for   each in TBST. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":151,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f0rd1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"equ8k","text":"Place the sections in 0.3% hydrogen peroxide and 0.1% sodium azide diluted in blocking buffer for   at   to quench endogenous peroxidases.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":98,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":103,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b3ug2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"el246","text":"Wash the sections 3 times in TBST, incubate with ABC reagent for  , and wash off with borate buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":65,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"72vq9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"kqok","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5i21v","text":"Wash the gel several times in dH20, and stain the proteins with colloidal Coomassie blue. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7p52","text":"Then excise the entire sample for trypsin digestion and mass spectrometry. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"12g61","text":"Wash the gel pieces with  ammonium bicarbonate (AmB)/acetonitrile (ACN) and reduce with   dithiothreitol (DTT) at   for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":88,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":114,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":120,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fmcfh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"50","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":2700,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4blbo","text":"Alkylate the cysteines using   iodoacetamide in the dark for   at   (RT).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":61,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":66,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"56g03","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":2700,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f76go","text":"Wash the gel bands in   AmB/ACN prior to adding   trypsin (Promega #V5111) for   incubation at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":48,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":79,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":95,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8pstr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":2700,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"aan2u","text":"Collect the peptide containing supernatants into a separate tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2cq78","text":"Wash the gel pieces with gentle shaking in 50% ACN/1% FA at   for , and collect the supernatant in the previous tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":65,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"82hs5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"rv8c","text":"Do the final peptide extraction step with 80% ACN/1% FA, and 100% ACN, and collect all supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bm6jb","text":"Dry the peptides in a speedvac and reconstitute with 5% ACN/0.1% FA in water before injecting into LC-MS/MS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9aik8","text":"Analyse the peptides by LC-MS/MS using a Dionex UltiMate 3000 Rapid Separation nanoLC coupled to an Orbitrap Elite Mass Spectrometer (Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc.).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dhu20","text":"Load the samples onto the trap column, which is 150 μm x 3 cm in-house packed with 3 µm ReproSil-Pur® beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"apm79","text":"The analytical column is a 75 µm x 10.5 cm PicoChip column packed with 3 µm ReproSil-Pur® beads (New Objective, Inc. Woburn, MA).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fh8hj","text":"Keep the flow rate at 300 nL/min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"doc9s","text":"Ellute all the fractions from the analytical column at a flow rate of 300 nL/min using an initial gradient elution of 5% B from   to  , transition to 40% over  , 60% for  , ramping up to 90% B for  , holding 90% B for  , followed by re-equilibration of 5% B at   with a total run time of  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":128,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":133,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":159,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":170,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":197,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":218,"length":1},{"key":6,"offset":261,"length":1},{"key":7,"offset":288,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8mg83","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":6000,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":240,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"4":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"5":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"6":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"7":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6tb5i","text":"Record the mass spectra (MS) and tandem mass spectra (MS/MS) in positive-ion and high-sensitivity mode with a resolution of ∼60,000 full-width half-maximum. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"772na","text":"Select the 15 most abundant precursor ions in each MS1 scan for fragmentation by collision-induced dissociation (CID) at 35% normalized collision energy in the ion trap. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d5i8q","text":"Dynamically excluded the previously selected ions from re-selection for  . {"blocks":[{"key":"bsms9","text":"Include carbamidomethyl cysteine as a fixed modification and oxidized methionine, deamidated asparagine and aspartic acid, and acetylated N-terminal as variable modifications in all searches.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ao5o0","text":"Allow three missed tryptic cleavages. Apply a 1% false discovery rate cutoff at the peptide level. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3jlf4","text":"Consider only proteins with a minimum of two peptides above the cutoff for further study. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2tmac","text":"To estimate BAR enrichment, apply   of bead eluent to a methanol activated polyvinylidene difluoride (PVDF) membrane and then allow to dry completely.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"334o3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1f57g","text":" Reactivate the membrane then in methanol, rinse with water, and post-fix in 4% PFA for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":88,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3mghq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
